impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FCOMP - Compensation
To pay compensation of £5000.00. This order relates to an offence the defendant admitted and asked the court to take into consideration on sentence
FO - Fine
Fined £56788.00
INSTL - Payment terms - Instalments only
Payment terms - Instalments only. £100.00 to be paid monthly. Instalment start date: 12/11/2025.
NOCOLLO - No collection order reason
No collection order. Reason: impracticable or inappropriate.
